jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer
Senior Android Developer
Android Developer
Android Engineer
jobs_results.description:
At Plum, we're on a mission to maximise wealth for all. We‚Äôre making saving money effortless and turning investing into something everyone can do. Our journey began back in 2017, when we became one of the first to use artificial intelligence and automation to simplify personal finance. Fast forward to today, and we've already helped people save ¬£2 billion across 10 European markets.

Named the UK's fastest-growing fintech in the Deloitte Technology Fast 50, our success is down to the passion and dedication of our diverse team. Based in our London, Athens and Nicosia offices, 170 talented people work together to empower people to do more with their money. And now, the team is growing!

The Role

We‚Äôre looking for a user-focused Android Engineer to join our engineering team. You'll be building Plum on Android from its early days, giving our current and prospective customers a more intimate way to interact with their money.

Our Engineering Approach

We value good engineering principles, imagination, quirkiness and healthy curiosity. We take a conservative approach to using external frameworks and we aspire to write simple, well-tested code, delivered in rapid iterations.

How We Work

We work in "squads" ‚Äì a more startup-appropriate name for saying small, cross-functional teams. Each squad has a mission and a set of KPIs to monitor and improve. As an engineer you'll be working in a squad, but you can also reach out to and work with anyone in the company. You will also be part of a Mobile engineering team, consisting of Mobile Product Engineers who share the same vision and passion of building an exceptional mobile team that will help people be financially better off.
‚Ä¢ Please note we are following a hybrid work model, in which we visit our office 2 times per week. #LI-Hybrid

Value You'll bring

‚Ä¢ You want to build a product that makes people better off
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre excited about programming in Kotlin
‚Ä¢ Yet, you still have intimate knowledge of the full Android stack and Android architecture patterns
‚Ä¢ You want to collaborate on a cutting-edge Android project
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre a designer's best friend. You love being part of the design process and enjoy turning the design into a well-crafted and delightful experience
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre a product person too ‚Äî you understand the value and impact of your work

Fist-bumps üëä if you have

‚Ä¢ Solid experience with Kotlin programming language
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with DI and Android architecture components
‚Ä¢ Sound understanding of Git strategies, continuous integration setup, and automation
‚Ä¢ Experience with unit testing
‚Ä¢ An eye for design that you can transform into Material Design!
‚Ä¢ Jetpack compose experience
‚Ä¢ A genuine interest in agile development processes
‚Ä¢ Solid experience working with remote data via REST and JSON

What to expect from our hiring process

At Plum, we value a lot the time you devote to the hiring process, this is why we are always trying to make the process as fast and smooth as possible.

2. 30 min. Call with our Recruitment Team. So we understand better your career plan and what motivates you. ‚öôÔ∏è
4. 45 min. Call with our Engineering Lead. Brief technical discussion about the role and your skills. üèÑ
6. Task. You will be given a task for us to better to understand your skills. No hard deadlines! üïπÔ∏è
8. 90 min. Consisting of two steps:
a. Call with two people from our Android team. We'll go over the task and introduce you to your future colleagues and to get a glimpse of Plum's culture. üß¨
b. Call with a Product Manager and an Engineering Manager for you to understand the business and envision yourself as part of Plum.
10. Offer üí∏

Plum's Perks

‚Ä¢ We're all in this together! Own part of the company through stock options üí∑
‚Ä¢ Annual training budget
‚Ä¢ Private Life Insurance - Ethniki Asfalistiki
‚Ä¢ Provident Fund - Ancoria Bank
‚Ä¢ Free Plum Premium subscription (normally ¬£9.99 a month).
‚Ä¢ Free parking slots
‚Ä¢ 25 days holiday a year, excluding public holidays
‚Ä¢ Employee referral scheme up to ‚Ç¨4000
‚Ä¢ Flexible approach to remote working, though we encourage at least 2-3 days a week in our beautiful office in Nicosia for optimal collaboration.
‚Ä¢ 45 days work from anywhere
‚Ä¢ Team lunch on Thursdays in the office, as well as a plentiful supply of fruit, snacks and coffee.
‚Ä¢ 1 day paid leave for volunteering, supporting you giving back to society.
‚Ä¢ 2 weeks paid sabbatical after four years of service.
‚Ä¢ Team trip to secret destinations once a year ‚úàÔ∏è
‚Ä¢ A vibe that‚Äôs ü¶ÑüåàüíØ

If you think this sounds like a bit of you then don‚Äôt hesitate to get in touch!

Thanks,

Plum Œ§eam üíú
‚Ä¢ Plum is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Plum does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin or any other basis covered by appropriate law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer (Kotlin) (Cyprus)
Mobile App Developer / Engineer (Android / iOS)
jobs_results.description:
Mobile App Developer / Engineer (Android / iOS)

REF# 2017-01-APP

Headquartered in Nicosia, Axiom (www.axiomc.com) offers strategic marketing consulting and information technology solutions for customer loyalty management and relationship marketing.

Axiom‚Äôs award-winning software platform is used by prestigious corporations in 12 countries, in 3 continents.

We are looking for a highly motivated individual to join our Mobile Innovation team on a full-time basis as a Mobile App Developer / Engineer.

Duties and responsibilities

You will be responsible to:

¬ß Develop and maintain Android and iOS codebase for apps used by hundreds of thousands of users.

¬ß Help define and build new features using clear, modular and well documented code.

¬ß Work to resolve application issues reported by users.

To succeed in this position, you should:

¬ß Be willing to learn and work outside of your comfort zone, with platforms you are not currently familiar with.

¬ß Work as a team player, following guidelines on coding practices, while at the same time be willing to propose your ideas.

¬ß Be an effective collaborator with both non-technical and technical team members.

¬ß Be ready to receive and give implementation feedback in the form of code reviews.

¬ß Be motivated, hard-working, with attention to detail and passion for quality.

Recruitment process

Axiom‚Äôs recruitment follows the following steps:

1. If your CV is shortlisted, you will be invited to sit for Technical and Communication tests (3 hours).

2. Interview with Team leaders (1 hour)

3. Interview with Company Director (0.5-1 hour)

4. Additional final activity. A technical presentation on a topic of your choice, to evaluate presentation skills (0.5 hour).

To apply

Submit a resume and cover letter to info@axiomc.com. Applications will be treated with strict confidentiality. For inquiries regarding the position please call +357 22 878900 and ask for Job Vacancy App Developer.

We look forward to receiving your application.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Android Developer VAC-17694M
jobs_results.description:
For a Software development company in Limassol we are looking for a skilled Mobile Developer with prior developing experience to create and maintain mobile applications for Android. Your primary focus will be creating a prototype and later on developing an application which can replace the application currently in use. This application currently is - and your successor then will - be used by one of the leading full-service providers for a complete inventory service in the German-speaking market. Using a handheld device every member of the team, executing the inventory, will use the application to track his progress and to send the collected data to an online-service.

You'll be developing a new mobile product which will replace the existing application developed for Windows CE. The app you work on will be used daily by a large European workforce enabling them to work smarter and faster. You'll be working in a team of highly skilled software craftsmen of various disciplines, always on the lookout for the smartest solutions that make the workday of our customers easier.

Activities and Responsibilities

Drive the initial creation and architecture of a new mobile app

Implement new features

Understand business requirements from user stories, perform story refinement and estimation

Plan the tasks together with the product owner and team

Plan and perform testing together with QA automation engineers

Architectural design

Integrate mobile applications in the continuous integration and continuous release processes

Do 2nd and 3rd level support and bug fixing

jobs_results.title: Android Developers (Fresh Graduates may apply)
jobs_results.description:
Our client, a well-established consulting and information technology solutions provider is looking for talented Android developer (all levels) to join their growing team in Nicosia!

We are looking for Juniors, Intermediates & Seniors! The team and working environment is awesome!!!

Key duties and responsibilities:

- Develop and maintain applications used by large organizations worldwide

- Help define and build new features using clear, modular and well documented code, based on object-oriented concepts and multi-tier architecture

- Work to resolve application issues reported by users

- Document or assist in documentation of your work at technical and business level.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer (React Native)
jobs_results.description:
‚Ä¢ Competitive Salary + Benefits Package
‚Ä¢ Hybrid Model ‚Äì 2 Day‚Äôs from Home
‚Ä¢ Birthday Leave, Gym Membership & much more

Unmissable opportunity for a Mid-level Mobile Developer experienced in React Native to join a leading Forex Trading Company based in the beautiful coastal city of Larnaca. Are you Mobile Developer with 2 -4 Years experience ? Do you want to join an Industry giant whilst enjoying a truly comprehensive benefits package? If so then this role is for you!

Tasks
‚Ä¢ Participate in the development of new or existing Mobile apps.
‚Ä¢ Implement fluent user interfaces in React Native.
‚Ä¢ Implement native features in Swift/SwiftUI for iOS and/or Kotlin/Jetpack Compose for Android.
‚Ä¢ Implement reusable UI components.
‚Ä¢ Accompany changes with a good suite of automated tests.
‚Ä¢ Provide full analysis and documentation according to the software development life cycle.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot issues that arise during the day-to-day operation of the business.

Requirements
‚Ä¢ BSc/BA in Computer Science/ Computer Engineering, or a related field.
‚Ä¢ 2+ years of React Native experience with apps for IOS and Android.
‚Ä¢ Experience with CI/CD environment.
‚Ä¢ Experience with developing native Android and IOS would be considered an advantage.
‚Ä¢ Experience with automated testing for mobile apps would be considered an advantage.
‚Ä¢ Experience in any of the following Python Frameworks - FastApi, Tornado, or Flask would be considered an advantage.

Benefits
‚Ä¢ Attractive remuneration package
‚Ä¢ 22 days of Annual Leave (reaching up to 30 days per year based on years‚Äô service)
‚Ä¢ Hybrid Work Mode
‚Ä¢ Friday afternoons off in Summer (July & August)
‚Ä¢ Birthdays are always a day off!
‚Ä¢ Referral Bonus ‚Äì refer a candidate we would all enjoy to work with!!
‚Ä¢ Participation in the Company‚Äôs Medical Scheme from day one!
‚Ä¢ Participation in the Company‚Äôs Group Discount Scheme
‚Ä¢ Free Gym Membership (Larnaca)
‚Ä¢ Unlimited snacks, fruits, and beverages
‚Ä¢ Complimentary periodic lunches at the office
‚Ä¢ Fun team-building activities & Corporate events
‚Ä¢ Lifelong Learning Allowance plus paid Educational Leave

IT Jobs Worldwide is a professional recruitment company that focuses on connecting IT talents with the most exciting vacancies worldwide. We specialize in specific IT areas including Java, PHP, .NET, Python, JavaScript, Swift, Objective-C, Kotlin, Dart, QA and Testing, Data and BI, and Infrastructure.

IT Jobs Worldwide is part of the Worldwiders brands, with more than 80 colleagues all over Europe. We have offices in Oslo, Tallinn, Malaga, Malta, and Lisbon. With over 300 clients in over 30 countries, our recruitment solutions are tailormade and set up to add value that benefits the matchmaking process.

jobs_results.title: Kotlin Multiplatform Developer
jobs_results.description:
Wrike is the most powerful work management platform. Built for teams and organizations looking to collaborate, create, and exceed every day, Wrike brings everyone and all work into a single place to remove complexity, increase productivity, and free people up to focus on their most purposeful work.

Our vision: A world where everyone is free to focus on their most purposeful work, together.

Ready to become a Wriker?Wrike is an enterprise-ready, cloud-based collaborative work management platform for managing cross-functional work at scale that is fully configurable and enables contextual collaboration in a secure environment. Enterprises use Wrike to offer a single digital workplace for all of their departments and teams.

The Wrike platform has the power needed to support the most complex workflows, all managed through an intuitive and easy-to-use and adopt interface. The Wrike platform can be customized to any user, team, department, or project so your teams can make requests, plan projects, assign tasks, collaborate with team members, track progress on work, and more.

Know more about your teamProduct Teams within Mobile Unit are high-standard teams, delivering value to our customers who are using Wrike Mobile. Our teams are organised around customer problems to solve and consist of iOS, Android and back-end engineers, manual and automation QA, product manager, and product designer and analyst. You will work closely with your Scrum team to make sure that the solutions we deliver to our customers are feasible, valuable and usable.

Our application is large and complex; we support several languages, offline mode, adaptive navigation, and we‚Äôve developed a system of visual themes and our own library of UI elements for the app.

Our Tech Stack‚Ä¢ Kotlin, Kotlin Coroutines, Flow, ViewModel, Compose, Ktor, Dagger
‚Ä¢ Kotlin Multiplatform and Compose Multiplatform for the new features

How You‚Äôll Make an Impact:‚Ä¢ Working on complex mobile applications
‚Ä¢ Developing new features from the concept and design to implementation and release, take ownership of them
‚Ä¢ Maintaining existing features, fix bugs and performance issues
‚Ä¢ Making sure we solve the right problems with the right solutions - perform code review and actively participate in Android and iOS platform sync
‚Ä¢ Communication with team members (developers, QA, product designers and product manager) and other teams

You‚Äôll achieve your best if you have:‚Ä¢ 5+ years of relevant software development experience and a Bachelor/Master‚Äôs degree
‚Ä¢ Confident knowledge of Kotlin and Android SDK
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of asynchronous programming with Kotlin Coroutines and Flow
‚Ä¢ Understanding of UI design patterns (MVVM or any other MVx)
‚Ä¢ Experience in UI development using Jetpack Compose
‚Ä¢ Experience in developing client-server applications; basic knowledge of SQL

You will stand out with:‚Ä¢ Experience in creating complex and performant UI components
‚Ä¢ Experience in iOS development (Swift, SwiftUI)
‚Ä¢ Experience in writing unit and UI tests
‚Ä¢ Experience in working with large projects

Interpersonal Skills:‚Ä¢ Good communication skills: present one‚Äôs point of view, listen to colleagues and find consensus
‚Ä¢ Good skills in prioritization and argumentation of technical solutions
‚Ä¢ Passion about the product and the team

Perks of working at Wrike‚Ä¢ Health insurance which covers your whole family
‚Ä¢ SIM card with unlimited internet access for employees (provided during your employment)
‚Ä¢ 21 paid vacation days
‚Ä¢ 5 uncertified sick days per year
‚Ä¢ Two fully paid weeks of sick leave
‚Ä¢ Office Lunch Allowance
‚Ä¢ School allowance of up to ‚Ç¨600 per month (for children at pre-school and school age)
‚Ä¢ Support with the Annual Tax reconciliation (only applicable for the year of relocation)
‚Ä¢ Up to 18 weeks of fully-paid maternity leave
‚Ä¢ 2 weeks of fully paid paternity leave. Enhanced four weeks of fully paid paternity leave

What‚Äôs next?‚Ä¢ Interview with a Recruiter
‚Ä¢ Technical interview
‚Ä¢ Cultural interview

Your recruitment buddy will be Pavel Kucera, Sr. Talent Acquisition Specialist

#LI-PK1

Who Is Wrike and Our CultureWe‚Äôre a team of innovators and creators who solve the complex work problems of today and tomorrow.

Hybrid work mode

Wrike promotes a hybrid work mode for those that live near an office hub, we meet in the office 2-3 times a week. This work mode supports our culture of collaboration and solving problems fast to deliver business outcomes and win together.
Our persona üí° Smart: We love what we do, and we‚Äôre great at it because this is our domain. Our combined knowledge in this space is unmatched.
üíö Dedicated: We get up every day focused on helping our customers win. We‚Äôre committed to helping our teammates win, too!
ü§ó Approachable: We're friendly, easy to get along with, considerate, and helpful.
Our culture and Values ü§© Customer-Focused

We care about our customers. We understand the customer journey, experience, and value derived from Wrike. Decision-making and action-taking are done with the customer in mind.

ü§ù Collaborative

We work as one and win together, each bringing unique strengths that contribute to diversity of thought for better outcomes. Leveraging our own work management platform, we foster an environment of creative collaboration and shared achievement.

üé® Creative

We strive to succeed through continuous innovation. It‚Äôs our pursuit of novel concepts that helped us create a market category. We continue to cultivate a workplace that fosters creative thinking as a means of transcending conventional boundaries and empowers us to break new ground to deliver extraordinary work management solutions.

üí™ Committed

We believe in ownership at all levels of the organization, by owning workflows from start to finish. Each member of our team is an integral part of this commitment, establishing work as a platform for personal growth and transformation, as well as collective success and growth.

Check out our LinkedIn Life Page, Instagram, Wrike Engineering Team, Medium, Meetup.com, Youtube for a feel for what life is like at Wrike.
